reviewText: My children used to watch Hammy and his adventures early in the morning, but as they grew older and schedules changed, so did the TV routine. I was thrilled to find these on DVD! They came in the mail within a day or two after ordering and they are everything I'd hoped they would be. I recommend these to anyone with children. They are timeless, clever, and entertaining. The sellers should also be trusted with prompt service and quality products.
